challenges.title: Streamlining Information Architecture for a Government Website
challenges.subTitle: Government websites are often information-dense, which can overwhelm users trying to find specific services or information. Challenge: Rework the information architecture of a government website to make it easier for users to find relevant information and complete key tasks.

challenges.title: Building Trust in a Peer-to-Peer Marketplace
challenges.subTitle: In peer-to-peer marketplaces (e.g., for buying/selling used goods), users often hesitate to transact due to a lack of trust. Challenge: Design trust-building elements (such as reviews, ratings, and identity verification) for a peer-to-peer marketplace app.

challenges.title: Redesigning UX for Digital Payment Solutions in Developing Markets
challenges.subTitle: In many developing regions, digital payment systems can be complicated or inaccessible for users unfamiliar with tech-heavy interfaces. Challenge: Redesign the user experience of a digital payment solution tailored for users in developing markets, with a focus on simplicity, security, and trust-building.

challenges.title: Reducing Decision Fatigue in Subscription Services
challenges.subTitle: Subscription services often present too many choices, leading to decision fatigue for users. Challenge: Redesign the subscription selection process of a service (e.g., Netflix or meal kits) to minimize choice overload while maintaining user autonomy.

challenges.title: Streamlining the UX of Job Application Platforms
challenges.subTitle: Applying for jobs online can be time-consuming, often requiring repeated entry of the same information. Challenge: Redesign the job application process for an employment platform, reducing redundant tasks and improving applicant tracking.

challenges.title: Improving the UX of Personal Finance Apps for Low-Literacy Users
challenges.subTitle: Many financial apps assume users are financially literate, which alienates users with low financial or digital literacy. Challenge: Redesign a personal finance app to better serve users with limited literacy, focusing on icons, simplified text, and interactive guidance.

challenges.title: Building a Community-Driven Fitness App
challenges.subTitle: Fitness apps are often single-user experiences, missing out on the motivational boost of a supportive community. Challenge: Design a fitness app with community features that encourage users to connect, share progress, and support one another.

challenges.title: Designing a Donation Platform for Charitable Causes
challenges.subTitle: Many people want to donate to causes but are discouraged by unclear processes or trust issues with where their money goes. Challenge: Create a donation platform that offers transparency, ease of use, and personalized recommendations based on the user’s interests and values.

challenges.title: Enhancing the UX of Music Collaboration Tools for Remote Musicians
challenges.subTitle: With more remote collaboration, musicians need better tools to work together across distances. Challenge: Redesign a music collaboration tool to make it easier for remote musicians to create, edit, and share music in real-time or asynchronously.

challenges.title: Designing an Intuitive Voting System for Elections
challenges.subTitle: Many voting systems are unintuitive and create barriers to participation due to confusion or inaccessibility. Challenge: Design an easy-to-use and accessible voting system for local elections that simplifies ballot navigation and improves user trust in the process..

challenges.title: Designing a Personalized Fitness App for People with Disabilities
challenges.subTitle: Fitness apps are often one-size-fits-all and don’t address the unique needs of people with physical or cognitive disabilities. Challenge: Design a fitness app tailored for people with disabilities, providing personalized workouts and accessibility features that adapt to users’ abilities.

challenges.title: Improving the UX of Public Transit Kiosks for Tourists
challenges.subTitle: Tourists often struggle to navigate public transit systems in unfamiliar cities, especially when kiosk interfaces are poorly designed. Challenge: Design a tourist-friendly public transit kiosk interface that simplifies ticket purchasing, route navigation, and offers language support for foreign visitors.

challenges.title: Designing a Community-based Grocery Shopping Experience
challenges.subTitle: Users are becoming more focused on sustainability and supporting local businesses, but grocery apps often fail to provide local options or community integration. Challenge: Design a grocery app that focuses on local produce, allowing users to connect with nearby vendors and reduce their environmental impact.

challenges.title: Designing an Inclusive Banking App for the Unbanked Population
challenges.subTitle: A large portion of the global population remains unbanked due to barriers like lack of trust, financial literacy, or access to digital tools. Challenge: Design a mobile banking app tailored for the unbanked, with features that build trust, improve financial literacy, and simplify the onboarding process for those unfamiliar with traditional banking systems.

challenges.title: Redesigning the Job Search Experience for Career Shifters
challenges.subTitle: Career shifters often have different needs compared to traditional job seekers, such as reskilling, exploring new industries, or showcasing transferable skills. Challenge: Redesign a job search platform to better support career changers, with features like reskilling recommendations, alternative career paths, and highlighting transferable skills in profiles and applications.

challenges.title: Improving the UX of Content Moderation Tools for Online Communities
challenges.subTitle: Moderating online communities is a complex task that requires efficient tools for identifying and managing harmful content while fostering engagement and trust. Challenge: Redesign a content moderation dashboard for community managers, simplifying the process of filtering, flagging, and responding to harmful content, while providing more nuanced tools to maintain community guidelines without stifling conversation.

challenges.title: Redesigning the UX for Online Art Marketplaces
challenges.subTitle: Artists and collectors often struggle with finding transparent, user-friendly online platforms for selling or buying art, due to complex payment systems or vague terms. Challenge: Redesign an online art marketplace that simplifies the buying and selling process, improves trust between artists and buyers, and offers clear insights into art valuations and authenticity.
